resources.string: A mysterious figure shrouded by black mist.

Huh, why... oh, you can see me, don\'t you? That means you\'re not one of \"them\". I see you\'re not fond of all these monsters as well. Tell you what, if you\'ll help me out with a little problem, then I will offer you my assistance. Somewhere on this level you will find a beast of darkness, a \"Treacherous Spirit\". Slay it, take it\'s heart and come back to me. And one more thing, if you are interseted in purchasing my suplies, don\'t hesitate to ask
Help me and I\'ll help you.
Excelent. Here take this potion, surely, you will find it benefitial.
Black pulsating heart of the Trecherous Spirit.
